alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington County through 200 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richmond, or near South Kingstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Narragansett, Charlestown, Richmond and Exeter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
